articles.author: Carly Johnson, Sonia Horon
articles.title: Lily James, Nicole Kidman, Kristen Stewart and Rita Ora at Chanel Pre-Oscar Awards dinner - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 14th annual soiree was held at the Polo Lounge at the iconic Beverly Hills Hotel and brings Hollywood's top talent and fashion's elite together for one glamorous night.
articles.content:
Nicole Kidman, Lily James, Kristen Stewart and Rita Ora brought their fashion A-game as they led arrivals at Chanel and Charles Finch's 14th Annual Pre-Oscar Awards dinner on Saturday night.
